H0.text: What country won 3 of the 5 Olympic gold medals awarded in baseball. United States

H1.text: What country won 3 of the 5 Olympic gold medals awarded in baseball. Japan

H2.text: What country won 3 of the 5 Olympic gold medals awarded in baseball. South Korea

H3.text: What country won 3 of the 5 Olympic gold medals awarded in baseball. Cuba

A4.text: Japan defeated the United States in the inaugural tournament finale in 1984.

A5.text: In 1988, the United States won over Japan.

A6.text: Since becoming a medal sport, it was the first time Cuba had not won the gold medal.
